summary: Adds a pleasant morning mist over rivers and docks near cities and towns. Includes MCM menu to adjust fog frequency.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ceGz77B.png[/img]




[color=GhostWhite][b]Morning Fogs Refined[/b][/color]
[color=#696969][size=4][b]by egocarib[/b][/size][/color]



[color=GhostWhite][b]Based on the original [/b][/color][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24810][color=#CCF8F8]Morning Fogs[/color][/url] mod
by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3150929][color=#CCF8F8]MannyGT[/color][/url][/b]








[color=GhostWhite]
[size=3]
This version of the mod changes fog mechanics to allow a bit more customization.

[b]Using the new MCM menu:[/b][/size][/color][size=3]
- [color=#aaFFFF]Adjust the % chance that morning fogs will appear each day[/color] -
- [color=#aaFFFF]Change or randomize the time of day that fog will appear & disappear.[/color]Â -[/size]









[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24810/?tab=3&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D24810%26user%3D1&pUp=1][b][color=#CCF8F8]More Images[/color][/b][/url]



[color=#565656]~thanks for the video, Shinji72! ~[/color]
[youtube]zFynWOjbAgI[/youtube]

[color=#565656]~ older low quality video ~[/color]
[youtube]ZIK1jJ4yhZo[/youtube]



[color=GhostWhite][b]Fog Locations:[/b]
Docks of Solitude
Riften
Windhelm
Dawnstar
Riverwood
Ivarstead
Half Moon Mill
Markarth
Dragonbridge
Mara's Eye Pond
[/color]


[/center]
[color=#313131].[/color]
author: egocarib
